title: - Sea Conditions schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised geographic description of a Point of Interest

waveLevel.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Douglas sea scale'. It indicates the height of the waves and also measures the swell of the sea.

seaTemperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Celsius degrees'. Sea surface temperature.

waveHeight.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Meters'. Height of the waves.

wavePeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Seconds'. Indicates the time between the crests of a wave.

seapH.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Acidity or basicity of an aqueous solution.

seaSalinity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Parts per thousand'. Indicates the amount of salts dissolved in water.
